resources.string:
This is 2100. All the fossils were used and there are no more resources.

You are a new minister of UN Ministry of Environment. World citizens are asking you to handle the energy problem. You got a permission from UN Economic and Social Council to install solar energy generators in 30 countries.

For the future of the humanity, study each energy. Install energy generators properly.
The turbine inside changes wind\'s kinetic energy into electrical energy by spinning.
The mirrors collect solar thermal and boil the water. The steam makes turbine spin and make energy.
Semiconducting materials change light into electricity by photovoltaic effect (light make electrons move).
